<urn2:townName>trew</urn2:townName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn3:debtor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="EUR">\r <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn2:country>DE</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:creditor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r
